short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows someone's profile picture next to their name.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Reddit extension that shows people's profile picture next to their comments, and shows a small version of their profile picture next to their name.

Compatible with RES, supports both old and new reddit.
